attributes.comment:
I would like to strongly object to the proposed fee increases as detailed in the
proposal. Currently my family is approaching the end of our adoption of an orphan
from China, and the most difficult part of the process for us has been dealing with
the USCIS.

Since the I-600A only lasts 18 months, it is IMPOSSIBLE to complete the
adoption before it expires, so we will be subject to more fees, money which could
be much better spent on providing for the child.

I urge you to abandon these fee increases, and further suggest that the current fee
structure should in fact be reduced.

Thank you.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Roger
